subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rashard Lewis, a Seattle SuperSonics forward for nine years, agreed in principle Tuesday to sign a maximum, five-year deal with the Orlando Magic that was likely worth more than $80 million.
snippet: Rashard Lewis, a Seattle SuperSonics forward for nine years, agreed in principle Tuesday to sign a maximum, five-year deal with the Orlando Magic that was likely worth more than $80 million.
